attributes.review: A few min after downloading this a group of overweight and hideous trump supporters came to my house and started banging on my house . They later somehow got in and started smashing things and saying to give this a good rating. They then started shouting how they love trump even tho he is a racist homophobic $ex offender.🤧
attributes.title: ALMOST DIED🤧

attributes.review: This app singlehandedly wiped out my family, WITH ONE HAND, punched out my baby brother, and slashed the tires off my bike and then gave it to a crackhead that lives near Chick-Fil-A. They then proceeded to call me the n-word (I’m white) and kicked out my right crutch when my left leg was broken.
attributes.title: Horrible. Just horrendous craftsmanship.

attributes.review: I don’t like this app at all. I was seeing what it had and I saw that he isn’t Christian and that he wants to delete TikTok like Donald are you ok? Because if you want us to not use TikTok in the U.S you will have people that will hate you even more. TikTok lives matter!!!!!
attributes.title: TikTok lives matter

attributes.review: This app is super glitchy. When you click on something it just sits there and spins and spins and spins. I’ve had to wait 15+ minutes just to input some information. I highly recommended staying away from this app.
attributes.title: Terrible app

attributes.review: I downloaded this app to check what’s up with my president! And it made my phone start to malfunction!! It deleted all of my pics and contacts! Do you know how long it took for me to get them back! NEVER EVER again getting this app!!!
attributes.title: This is a discrace

attributes.review: The app is constantly lagging and the features are horribly designed. When it isn’t lagging its always exiting me out the app. Why is this even an app? It doesn’t work at all. I’m really disappointed! Apple do something about this😡
attributes.title: The Worst

attributes.review: This app is absolutely terrible it doesnt work at all it turns off my phone and restarts it and then it glitches and now this president isnt following what he promised he will do for this country i cant believe this. I honestly hate this app dont download it.
attributes.title: I cant believe this🤦‍♀️

attributes.review: When my dad opened the app and saw trump he had a hurt attack 😢 and when I deleted it he was better so please for your dad’s do not I said do not download this app we do not want to lose our dads because of a Orange 🍊 so be careful.          🍊🍊🍊🍊🍊🍊🍊🍊🤮🤮🤮🤮🤮❌❌❌❌❌❌❌❌❌❌❌❌❌❌❌❌❌
attributes.title: This app almost killed my dad

attributes.review: First of all I downloaded the app to see reasons to even vote for the president but it is so glitch and the app will only stay on for freaking 2 SECONDS like what the heck and the worse part of all the colors are lacking for me
attributes.title: Not to recommend

attributes.review: It’s a shame that after four years of mr trumps presidency that all he has to give to his supporters is an app that just promotes his campaign. It’s also a shame that the bunker boy himself is trying to take away LGBT rights, still supports ICE, and takes movements the people fight for as jokes to talk about on Twitter.
attributes.title: It’s a shame
